name: meaningly
content:

Add to word list
in a way that is intended to express a feeling or thought without saying it directly: With a deep sigh, she pushed her sleeve back from her wrist and pointed meaningly at her watch. He was silent as he looked me meaningly in the face. Synonym
meaningfully
More examplesFewer examplesHe answered meaningly, with a sideways glance at Robert.At the mention of that name, the detective smiled meaningly.She turned to look at him and she saw that he was gazing at her meaningly.
